events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car and has submitted the initial claim form describing the accident details.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident after verifying the keywords related to vehicle collision.
An insurance agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to manage and follow up on this case.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and next steps for processing.
The customer has been requested to provide additional documents including photos of the vehicle damage and police report.
Customer has successfully submitted all requested documents, including photos of the damaged vehicle and official police report.
Investigation team began examining the collision details, verifying the extent of vehicle damage and liability.
Completed investigation confirms the cause of accident and damage severity, report forwarded for claim settlement.
A settlement amount has been proposed to the customer based on damage assessment and policy coverage.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement amount and expressed satisfaction with the claims process so far.
The insurance claim was formally approved after all conditions were met and documentation verified.
Settlement payment has been processed and transferred to the customerâ€™s account for the vehicle repair costs.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed following payment disbursement and no further issues reported.
All claim documents and investigation reports have been archived for record-keeping and future reference.
